name: Pinwheel (Flat Pixel Studio)
description:
Pinwheel is an addictingly frustrating game of timing. Tap the screen before the Pinwheel spins past the current colour.

• Tap the wheel when the colours line up, but don't miss!
• Set a high score and challenge your friends!
• Climb the leaderboards and collect achievements along the way.
• Pinwheel is Easy to learn, impossible to master.
